DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter observational-interventional study critically ill patient require mechanical ventilation 48 hour , involve 13 ICU Chile . After period analysis training , analgesia-based , goal-directed , nurse-driven sedation protocol apply . Midazolam infusion start ventilatory distress continue despite fentanyl 1.8 Âµg/kg/min . Haldol , muscle relaxant sedative drug allow depend patient condition . After 48 hour mechanical ventilation , sedative drug discontinue morning . Main outcome : ventilator-free day . Secondary outcome : ICU stay , cost , sedation quality . At 6 moth SF-36 .
